recipesJson.name: Avocado Chocolate Mousse
recipesJson.author: besejuiced
recipesJson.description:
If youâ€™ve never tried avocado chocolate mousse before, this recipe will take you completely by surprise!
Not only does this velvety chocolate dessert taste utterly decadent, it let you go to chocolate heaven. It is rich and silky smoothâ€¦ and you really canâ€™t taste the avocado or can you...

Made with VTA Smooth Avocado Cream and VTA Chocolate Mousse enriched with FA Almond and FLV Cream and some FA Marshmallow to bind the mix.

What you will experience is a soft smooth silky chocolate inhale with a nice crunchy almond touch,  on the exhale, heavenly totally delicious, chocoholic vape with the richness of the avocado cream.

*Add sweetener to your likings I did not use any.

Steep 7 days

reviews.text: Mixed a 30 ml bottle of this because it seemed like a good way to try out the VT avocado I just picked up. So well balanced with hints of creamy nutty chocolate, coconut, banana, avocado?? Think I found a new ADV. Great job Sejouced!
Great tasting vape. Can be an ADV without a doubt. Is it really avocado I can taste back there?
I made this without sweetener. Wasn't sure I was going to like this, but I did. This is the first dark/milk chocolate vape that I really enjoy. Well done & thanks for sharing ðŸ’¨

If this is as good after 7 days as it is fresh? I'll come back and leave TEN stars! Oh wait. I can only leave 5. Well, I'm leaving them now because this is already an ADV for me as a S&V. Smooth, thick & chocolatey and nutty as HELL! Great job, bro!! #ejm, yo!!
